title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: I find ste that show volume of all mixers is this accurate they can determine the volume? https://best-bitcoin-mixer.io/

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: No, the site logo is like CMC(lol). And it's impossible to check mixer's volume by any chance. There's even an exchange score column (lol). Plus the websites URL are phishing site scam (blender.io -> blendar.io), also they are using the some mixers/tumblers that are no longer working (bestmixer, blender.io). I'm guessing this site is really made to scam anyone, by phishing tricks.Also, i'm wondering where you found this site?

comments.author: dhru9
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on September 09, 2022, 01:26:06 PMNo, the site logo is like CMC(lol). And it's impossible to check mixer's volume by any chance. There's even an exchange score column (lol). Plus the websites URL are phishing site scam (blender.io -> blendar.io), also they are using the some mixers/tumblers that are no longer working (bestmixer, blender.io). I'm guessing this site is really made to scam anyone, by phishing tricks.Also, i'm wondering where you found this site?I write : best bitcoin mixers 2022in google.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on September 09, 2022, 01:05:56 PMI find ste that show volume of all mixers is this accurate they can determine the volume? This is a scam website and I wouldn't trust anything I read there including random volume!First thing I noticed is they have fake scam mixer in second place with blendar.com domain, and same thing is for CryptoMixer that leads to suspicious domain cryptomixer-io.net.It's probably the same thing with all other mixing websites they listed.Domain is coming from Ukraine, Sumskaya Oblast :QuoteDomain Name: best-bitcoin-mixer.ioRegistry Domain ID: 8c4f31d1a4144bbcb40f7fff79a9ed08-DONUTSRegistrar WHOIS Server: http://whois.iisp.comRegistrar URL: http://www.nicenic.netUpdated Date: 2022-01-29T00:25:10ZCreation Date: 2022-01-24T00:24:17ZRegistry Expiry Date: 2023-01-24T00:24:17ZRegistrar: NICENIC INTERNATIONAL GROUP CO., LIMITEDhttps://www.whois.com/whois/best-bitcoin-mixer.io

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on September 09, 2022, 01:36:47 PMI write : best bitcoin mixers 2022in google.This is really the problem, the power of SEO. Anyone who get fooled by this results in search page if will not research properly will become one of those scam victims, worst will blame the legit mixer because of their stupidity. While in the other hand, current legit mixers had almost zero visibility in the search result page using these kind of keywords. The thread[1] regarding trusted mixers shows in the 2nd page which is a bit disappointed, but not surprised considering this forum software is too outdated and not SEO friendly.[1] 2022 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: I wonder why there's no one noticed the website logo because they're using coinmarketcap logo lol, there's no mentioned on the site if best-bitcoin-mixer is connected with coinmarketcap, so we can say this site is scam.With various typo, no explanation on the 24 hours volume, no Wasabi and Chipmixer are included on the list, I think it's already red flag and it was a poorly created site by a scammer.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Ridiculous to me, how Bitcoin mixers would be traced where people have been using it to cut the link between addresses. Then what is the meaning of using Mixer if the volume is tracked? I think the site has been created for fun or any other reason. Data won't be accurate anyway. Avoid.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on September 09, 2022, 01:05:56 PMI find ste that show volume of all mixers is this accurate they can determine the volume? https://best-bitcoin-mixer.io/I didn't know that you are this dumb. No wonder, you didn't clearly read chipmixer's instructions and FAQs and ended up donating some BTC. Maybe you need a break and some brain reset to start thinking normal againLook at the list of mixers from the site you just shared. All of them are scam or fakeHere, let me help you since you are a little challenged mentally.Code:1. cryptomixer-io.net - Fake/Scam2. blendar.io - Fake/Scam3. veio.io - Fake/Scam4. bitcoin-laundry.net - Fake/Scam5. my-crypto-mixer.com - Fake/Scam6. smartmixer.net - Fake/Scam7. coinmixer-es.net - Fake/Scam8. blenderbitmixer.com - Fake/Scam9. best-mixer.net - Fake/Scam10. bitcoinmixer-io.com - Fake/Scam

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: I wouldn't call @OP "dumb" or "little challenged mentally" he did what most people do. They use a search engine. And he didn't fail in the trap since he finally used the official Chipmixer's website.As for his problem with CM, which is not one, as the dudes explained to him, is a problem of understanding.Here he opened a topic to ask if the volume is accurateQuote from: PX-Z on September 09, 2022, 01:49:17 PMThat's because I've never SEO'ed the page, unlike scammers like AtoBmixer who bombarded google. The topic ranks well in some countries, but is nowhere to be found in others (like my location) Quote from: The Cryptovator on September 09, 2022, 07:36:07 PMThe use of a mixer is to obfuscate the transaction, not to hide the fact you used a mixer.Quote from: Apocollapse on September 09, 2022, 01:56:15 PM no Wasabi and Chipmixer are included on the listbecause he can't scam playing with Wasabi

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on September 09, 2022, 01:49:17 PMQuote from: dhru9 on September 09, 2022, 01:36:47 PMI write : best bitcoin mixers 2022in google.This is really the problem, the power of SEO. That's the problem of Google SERP old blackhat SEO still works look I already check it on Ahrefs backlinks checker and most of the backlinks are low quality.And you will be noticed most of the backlinks and anchor text under hyperlinks target the keyword "best bitcoin mixers" it ranks in the top 2 on the SERP if you add 2022, it also targets other keywords but those keywords are not yet rank to the top. I'm sure it was just built for Churn and burn so later if Google/Penguin update finds out that they manipulate the Google rankings they are automatically outranked and removed from the Google SERP. It doesn't even have a cookie policy and privacy policy which is obvious it was built for scamming purposes.I hope OP does not own the website because he put the link above it will also help to rank up on Google having backlinks here on the forum has a big impact on SEO and I'm sure the owner of the website has lots of experienced in Blackhat SEO using GSA.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on September 09, 2022, 11:23:46 PMThat's the problem of Google SERP old blackhat SEO still works look I already check it on Ahrefs backlinks checker and most of the backlinks are low quality.And you will be noticed most of the backlinks and anchor text under hyperlinks target the keyword "best bitcoin mixers" it ranks in the top 2 on the SERP if you add 2022, it also targets other keywords but those keywords are not yet rank to the top. I don't know how blackhat seo works yet but obviously the domain name is really a big factor on this. The keywords used and domain name are exactly the same plus some seo works behind and it comes up a good result on the search page.Legit services like chipmixer and other really should work on their seo too to avoid search results like this.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: The site is obviously fake. If you simply look at the weekly visitors, you will know how much inaccurate they are. Besides, logfiles have said the fact. All the mixers listed there are with a clone phishing site which is an obvious scam without any more reason.Quote from: PX-Z on September 09, 2022, 01:26:06 PMNo, the site logo is like CMC(lol).Because they have copy pasted everything from CMC to make it look good.Quote from: BitMaxz on September 09, 2022, 11:23:46 PMThat's the problem of Google SERPÂ  + the advertisement system where no filtering is there. You can pay google to show your site on top of the search result. Scammers are taking the chance.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on September 10, 2022, 04:25:47 AMQuote from: BitMaxz on September 09, 2022, 11:23:46 PMThat's the problem of Google SERPÂ  + the advertisement system where no filtering is there. You can pay google to show your site on top of the search result. Scammers are taking the chance.Don't get confused between the advertisement slots and the google serp. There is no ads shows searching using that keyword too. The result is pure SEO tricks and the use of exact the same keyword for domain name. Plus, it will be hard to make a google ad regarding.crypto-related ads due to google recent ad update.
